sentences.en: After the darkness the feeble light of the paraffin lamp had seemed very bright.
sentences.cn: 在黑暗里耽过之后,煤油灯昏暗的灯光显得格外亮.

sentences.en: Gas that comes off the oil later is condensed into paraffin.
sentences.cn: 石油经过加热,最先冒出来的蒸汽冷却后就是质量最高的汽油.

sentences.en: He took the paraffin stove on a picnic and the ruddy thing wouldn't work.
sentences.cn: 他带了那个煤油炉去野餐，但是那个该死的东西根本用不了。

sentences.en: Many microspheres in the lung could be observed in the paraffin section.
sentences.cn: 各器官石蜡切片中,肺组织中有较多微球嵌顿.

sentences.en: Method: Technology of paraffin section and photomicrographic technique were used.
sentences.cn: 方法: 石蜡切片技术及显微成像技术.

sentences.en: Methods Paraffin method, semi - thin sectioning, and histochemical method were used.
sentences.cn: 方法石蜡切片法 、 半薄切片法 、 组织化学法.

sentences.en: Methods: Powder, fluorescence analysis, paraffin section, UV, TLC were used.
sentences.cn: 方法: 粉末制片法 、 石蜡切片法 、 荧光法 、 紫外吸收光谱法 、 薄层色谱法.

sentences.en: Object: to optimize the Paraffin TUNEL Assayfor detecting apoptosis in Broiler Bursa.
sentences.cn: 目的: 为了优化石蜡切片TUNEL法检测细胞凋亡的条件.

sentences.en: Paraffin , however, is not a good phlegmatizing agent.
sentences.cn: 石蜡并不是良好的钝感剂.

sentences.en: Paraffin has the property of dissolving grease.
sentences.cn: 石蜡具有溶解油脂的特性.

sentences.en: Paraffin Wax treatments completely relax in the warm moisture rich bath.
sentences.cn: 石蜡疗法完全放松在温暖潮湿丰富的温泉.

sentences.en: Paraffin waxes are normally marketed on the basis of a melting - point test.
sentences.cn: 石腊一般按其熔点不同在市场上分类出售.

sentences.en: Solvents containing trace of gas into paraffin recovery processes.
sentences.cn: 含微量溶剂的尾气进入石蜡回收工序.

sentences.en: The fire blazed up when I added paraffin.
sentences.cn: 我加了一些煤油,火就燃烧起来了.

sentences.en: We are exporter of Slack wax, Paraffin Wax RPO , Foots Oils from Iran.
sentences.cn: 我们是出口商松弛蜡, 石蜡的RPO, 脚灯油伊朗.

trans.tran_en: a soft white substance used for making  candle s  ,made from  petroleum  or coal
